name: #10: "TBC" by Keith Cirkel and "Start-Up to Exit: The Journey for Tech Companies" by Paul Jesson and Ian Zant-Boer
location: Vulcan Works, 34-38 Guildhall Rd, Northampton, NN1 1EW
parking: St. John's Multi Storey Car Park

schedule.title: "Start-Up to Exit: The Journey for Tech Companies" by Paul Jesson and Ian Zant-Boer
schedule.description: From idea to investment to exit, every stage of a tech companyâ€™s journey brings new financial and strategic challenges. In this session, Paul Jesson and Ian Zant-Boer share insights from their work advising high-growth technology businesses on how to build a finance foundation that attracts investors, supports innovation, and maximises long-term value. Paul will explore the key financial levers that drive growth, how to prepare for fundraising rounds and exits. Ian Zant-Boer will offer a legal and investor lens on scaling, sharing his experience as a venture capital founder and adviser to scale-ups on how to structure for investment and avoid common legal pitfalls during growth and exit.
